docs.title: Low Level Design (LLD) – Machine Coding Practice
docs.text: This repository contains production-style LLD solutions written in Java.

docs.title: 📌 What you’ll find
docs.text:
• Clear problem statements
  • Design patterns used (Strategy, Observer, Command, etc.)
  • Clean, interview-ready Java implementations
  • Edge cases & complexity discussion

docs.title: 🧠 Topics Covered
docs.text:
• Car Rental System
  • Rate Limiter
  • Text Editor (Undo/Redo)
  • Meeting Room Scheduler
  • Publish Subscribe System
  • Custom HashMap
  • And more…

👉 Use the left navigation to explore problems.

docs.title: 📜 Problem Statement
docs.text: Design a car rental service that supports: - Full-day bookings - Kilometer-based pricing - Booking overlap checks - Early return & delayed return handling

docs.title: Key Rules
docs.text:
• Inclusive date ranges
  • Effective end date = max(bookedTill, actualReturnDate)
  • Extra kms charged beyond daily free allowance
